author: keith
msg: Add Tomcat related Ant tasks for precompiling JSPs.

author: billbarker
msg: Document the new "useInternal" attribute to StaticInterceptor.

author: billbarker
msg: Adding a new option to serve welcome files via an internal sub-request.
The option is off by default so as to not break existing web-apps that are depending on this behavior.

author: costin
msg: Allow 'mini' to start with a configurable port.
( I use this to play with my Zaurus, and to get tomcat started in
the smallest amount of time - that's about 2 secs )
